title: Chapter 4483 - Chapter 4483: 4482 Origin Stone, Origin Stone
body:
Chapter 4483 - Chapter 4483: 4482 Origin Stone, Origin Stone

Chapter 4483: 4482 origin stone, origin stone

10 days in the federation, 10 universes were very close.

And because of this special reason, at the center of the 10 universes, a treasure land was born.

It was similar to the chaotic region, the land of origin.

But this place, compared to the chaotic region of the land of origin, was safer.

This also caused the ten universes to fight for treasures and resources. They fought for a very long time.

In the end, only three out of the ten universes remained.

The mechanical ascension to the universe was also due to the treasures here. It broke through the shackles of the Heaven’s origin and reached its current level.

Wang Xian was very curious about this place and was prepared to take a look.

He took out the ten-day alliance AI that the leader of the Dimensional Universe Federation had given him. Following the route, Wang Xian flew over quickly.

As he flew, he scanned his surroundings.

“The elite level of the strong and the disciples are also much stronger than the Justice Alliance.”

Wang Xian compared in his heart.

Overall, the overall strength of this ten-day alliance should be above that of the Justice Alliance!

It was very strong!

Wang Xian flew straight in. His speed wasn’t very fast.

Half a month later, he arrived at the center.

This was a huge sea of stars.

Yes, it was a special chaotic sea.

The blue sea was emitting a luster and looked very beautiful.

The entire sea was incomparably huge. Its area was equivalent to one-tenth of the entire universe.

Even so, it was still an extremely huge domain!

The Blue Ocean was made up of water energy. The endless water energy formed an ocean region.

Ignoring everything else, just cultivating in this ocean was equivalent to a powerful cultivation treasure ground for water-elemental experts.

“Cultivating in this ocean is no worse than cultivating in the domain formed by the god of elements. There is a saying that water is the source of life. With the ocean, other creatures and treasures can be born in the ocean naturally.”

Wang Xian mumbled.

The chaos was so huge that there were all kinds of strange domains.

Wang Xian was not too curious about this.

However, Wang Xian saw that there were a large number of spaceships and surveillance cameras flying around in this ocean.

According to the information that Wang Xian obtained from the AI, one would have to pay some treasures to enter and cultivate.

This sea was firmly controlled by the 10-day federation.

It was also because of the existence of this sea that many universes were attracted to join the 10-day federation.

Due to the addition of the New Universe, the 10-day federation would allow some of their powerhouses to cultivate here for free for a period of time.

The sea was called the Sea of life. As for whether the 10-day federation had searched the entire sea, it was still uncertain.

Such important information would naturally not be announced by the ten-day federation.

Wang Xian stared at the ocean of life curiously. With a move of his body, he disappeared instantly.

In the next moment, he had already entered the interior of the ocean of life.

Scanning his surroundings, he realized that there were some strong disciples cultivating inside.

He could also sense the aura of the strong ones in the Heaven’s origin realm.

Clearly, this place had attracted many strong ones.

Wang Xian moved his body and flew in quickly.

When he entered the depths, he realized that there were many powerful battleships in the Sea of life.

There were also gigantic mechas.

These battleships and mechas were floating in the Sea of life. They were completely silent and did not activate.

It was obvious that they were storing energy here.

There were numerous scouting aircrafts around these mecha battleships.

Wang Xian scanned the area and his eyes flickered slightly.

This should be a mecha battleship of the water attribute that was created by the mechanical ascension to the universe. It is either absorbing energy or storing energy here

Wang Xian thought to himself. He changed his position and continued to head deeper into the space.

After flying for another month, Wang Xian realized that there were many palaces in the deepest part of the land. There were some strong people entering and leaving.

“It seems that this place has been completely occupied. The treasures should have been searched as well.”

Wang Xian mumbled.

He didn’t stay here any longer and left quickly.

Next, he wanted to search for information about the stone of origin.

There was no information about the stone of origin on the universe’s AI.

The energy of the Stone of origin was at the Heaven’s origin level.

It was difficult for the weak to obtain it.

Furthermore, the stone of origin might not be called the stone of origin in this place.

Therefore, Wang Xian did not manage to find it.

“Let’s go to some shops and take a look.”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

The federation was extremely prosperous in the past ten days. There were all sorts of shops around the Sea of life.

Some of the shops were of a very high level. Occasionally, there would be heaven-grade items.

Wang Xian checked the AI and locked onto the next auction house.

Ascending appraisal auction house.

This was an auction house set up by the Mechanical Ascension Universe. It was also the largest auction house in the 10-day federation.

Wang Xian teleported out of the Sea of life and headed straight for the auction house of the 10-day federation.

The entire auction house was huge. There were intelligent beautiful robots at the entrance to welcome him.

Every robot had a strong combat ability.

“Welcome, sir, to the Ascension appraisal auction house. Would you like to appraise the treasure or auction it? Or do you need other services?”

Wang Xian arrived at the entrance of the Ascension appraisal auction house. The robot attendant walked over and greeted him respectfully.

“I’m here to appraise some items.”

Wang Xian said, “Also, let’s see if we can buy any items.”

“Yes, my Lord. Please follow me.”

The intelligent robot brought Wang Xian into the auction house.

Although the entire auction house was very luxurious, it wasn’t the kind of luxurious technology.

Instead, it was extremely antiques luxurious.

It had a style of green tiles and tiles that made people feel very comfortable.

“Sir, this way please. This is our intelligent appraiser.”

When they came to the appraisal table, the robot service staff said to Wang Xian.

Wang Xian looked over and saw an old man sitting there.

The appraisal of the ascending auction house was one-on-one.

The appraiser was an intelligent robot.

Of course, if there was something that they could not appraise, there would be experts who would appraise it.

“May I know what kind of gemstone this is? Do We have such a treasure here?”

Wang Xian still had two pieces of origin stones that he had yet to absorb. He took out one and handed it to the intelligent appraiser before asking.

“Yes, sir.”

The appraisal robot nodded and immediately started to scan.

Buzz

Following that, a golden glow bloomed in front of him.

“Sir, this is a source stone. It’s an extremely precious source stone.”

Very soon, the appraisal robot said to Wang Xian, “The source stone is extremely precious in our 10-day federation. Currently, there are many experts who are purchasing it at a high price. Sir, you can sell it in exchange for a large number of resources and treasures.”
